author: zongaro
msg: Changed <applet> tag to list all JAR files needed, as suggested by the README

author: zongaro
msg: New applet example using <param> tags to supply parameters.

author: zongaro
msg: Made changes to instructions to recommend listing JAR files on applet, rather
than suggesting the user tear apart the JAR's and put them back together as a
single JAR along with any translets.  Also mentioned a second HTML document

author: zongaro
msg: Updated sample to use the JAXP API, with XSLTC's "use-classpath" attribute to

author: zongaro
msg: Changed code to use the XSLTC TransformerFactory's "use-classpath" attribute
via the JAXP Transform API, rather than using the XSLTC Native API.
